paper.title: Systems analysis and design: current practices

keywords.keyword: Structured systems analysis and design method

paper.publisher: Society for Information Management and The Management Information Systems Research Center
paper.abstract: The process to develop computer-based information systems has changed significantly within the last ten years. Research was conducted to determine how organizations currently perform systems analysis and design. Responding organizations provided evaluations of their current approaches and tools. The results should provide insights for information systems practitioners and have implications for educational efforts and research in the information systems field.
